__e: However, of all the things there are to make a big deal out of, can my return to this hellhole please, please, please not be one of them?
At some point before your mother's death! Your father returned her letters to her.

I am tempted to put the sword to you and your man both, and bury this story for good, but what am I... if I spend my days pleading for a return to civility and then do dark things under the cover of night?
